posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have the following three SGC Graded T206s for sale. All three are well-centered.

Lou Ritter, Piedmont 350, SGC 50,  $55.00 SOLD
Frank Smith White Cap, Sweet Caporal 350, SGC 50, $55.00 SOLD
Billy Purtell, Piedmont 350, SGC 40, $40.00

Prices are delivered.

Also, I have an ungraded Ozzie Schreckengost, wrinkle across the chest of the player, stain on the top edge. $20.00.

Check, Money Order, or Paypal all okay.

Thanks for looking,

Joe

Hi Joe,

I'll take both the Ritter and Frank Smith.

Thanks,
Phil

Will take Purtell if available

Thanks, Keith
